The following bugs in omniORBpy 1.4 have been fixed. Update from CVS to get the fixes.

Summary: AttributeError in generated code (bug number 2)
Date: Mon May 27 02:32:48 BST 2002
Fixed by: dgrisby
Reported by: Bob Barry
Description: IDL with nested structs/unions could sometime lead to invalid Python stubs.
Summary: Segfault with narrow on pseudo object (bug number 1)
Date: Mon Dec 10 18:01:14 GMT 2001
Fixed by: dpg1
Reported by: Krzysztof Czarnowski
Description: Attempts to narrow a pseudo object like a POA would segfault.
